background: An office supply company makes two types of printers: color printers and black and white printers.

parameters.definition: Maximum number of color printers that can be produced per day
Maximum number of black and white printers that can be produced per day
Maximum number of printers that the paper tray installing machine can equip per day
Profit generated per black and white printer

constraint.description: Number of color printers is an integer
constraint.code:
# Ensure number of color printers is an integer
ColorPrinter = model.addVar(vtype=gp.GRB.BINARY, name="ColorPrinter")

# Add constraint for integer number of color printers
model.addConstr(ColorPrinter == model.getAttr(gp.GRB.Attr.VType, ColorPrinter), name="color_printer_integer_constraint")

constraint.description: Number of black and white printers is an integer
constraint.code:
# Ensuring number of black and white printers is an integer
# No additional code needed since the black and white printer variable is already defined as a binary variable

constraint.description: Number of color printers is non-negative
constraint.code:
# Ensuring the number of color printers is non-negative
# Note: Variables are already defined with the required integrality (CONTINUOUS) to allow for non-negativity by default
# No additional code needed for this constraint

constraint.description: Number of black and white printers is non-negative
constraint.code:
# Number of black and white printers is non-negative
# No additional code needed as the variable is defined with continuous variable type

constraint.description: The company can make at most MaxColor color printers per day
constraint.code:
# Add the constraint for restricting the number of color printers produced
model.addConstr(NumColorPrinters <= MaxColor, name="max_color_printers_constraint")

constraint.description: The company can make at most MaxBW black and white printers per day
constraint.code:
# Adding the constraint for the maximum number of black and white printers produced per day
model.addConstr(NumBlackWhitePrinters <= MaxBW, name="max_black_white_printers")

constraint.description: The company can make at most a total of MaxTotal printers per day

variables.definition: Binary variable indicating if a color printer is produced
Binary variable indicating if a black and white printer is produced
Number of black and white printers produced

objective.description: Maximize the company's profit, which is ProfitColor per color printer plus ProfitBW per black and white printer.
objective.code:
# Set objective
model.setObjective(ProfitColor * NumColorPrinters + ProfitBW * NumBlackWhitePrinters, gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)
